episodes.synopsis: This "Grey Gardens" spoof delves into the lives of an eccentric mother and daughter whose crumbling mansion is full of memories -- and secrets.
episodes.title: Sandy Passage

episodes.synopsis: In this parody of Vice's gonzo-style documentaries, hipster journalists throw caution to the wind as they hunt for a notorious Mexican drug lord.
episodes.title: DRONEZ: The Hunt for El Chingon

episodes.synopsis: This riff on the classic "Nanook of the North" details a director's struggle to maintain control of his film as his Inuit star grows more demanding.
episodes.title: Kunuk Uncovered

episodes.synopsis: This homage to Errol Morris's "The Thin Blue Line" exposes the lies and corruption that landed an innocent jazz lover in prison for murder.
episodes.title: The Eye Doesn't Lie

episodes.synopsis: Follow the residents of a small Icelandic town as they prepare for their most beloved annual tradition: an Al Capone festival and look-alike contest.
episodes.title: A Town, A Gangster, A Festival

episodes.synopsis: In this cameo-packed send-up of the music industry, two struggling Chicago musicians transform themselves into California soft rock legends.
episodes.title: Gentle and Soft: The Story of the Blue Jean Committee: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Decades after the band's sudden meltdown, a major honor gives Gene and Clark the chance to take the stage together again.
episodes.title: Gentle and Soft: The Story of the Blue Jean Committee: Part 2

video.title: Documentary Now!
video.synopsis: Elevating the art of parody, this sharply comic series spoofs high-profile documentaries such as "Grey Gardens" and "The Thin Blue Line."
